title: Lush Fields
blockb: (SAFE) If a character is at this location, gain +1 Food die.

title: Salmon Run
blockb: Immediate: Spend 10 progress to raise Food track by one.

title: The Weird Rock
blockb: (DOOM) Test: Lore 3. Failure: One character at this location is Shaken.

title: Ley Lines
blockc: Immediate: Spend 7 progress. One character at location gains +1 Lore. Move to stage 1.

title: Dark Thoughts
blockb: Action: Test Command 2. Success: Burn card. Failure: +1 Discord.
blockc: (DOOM) One character on mission becomes Angry.

title: Murky Caverns
blockc: Immediate: Spend 6 progress. One character at location gains +1 Survival. Move to stage 2.

title: Dark Thoughts
blockb: Action: Test Command 2. Success: Burn card. Failure: +1 Discord.
blockc: (DOOM) One character on mission becomes Angry.

title: The Formless Spawn
blockc: Immediate: Spend 9 progress. One character at location gains +1 Combat. Complete mission path and burn all Dark Thoughts.

title: Dark Thoughts
blockb: Action: Test Command 2. Success: Burn card. Failure: +1 Discord.
blockc: (DOOM) One character on mission becomes Angry.

title: Angry Mob
blockb: Action: Test Combat 1. Success: Burn card and +2 Discord. Failure: +1 Discord.
blockc: Action: Test Command. For every two successes, discard one Angry Mob at this location. Failure: +1 Discord.
blockd: (GANG) +1 Discord. Defense: Combat. If in staging area, move to occupied mission location.

title: Gill Nets
blockc: Immediate: Spend 8 progress. Gain +2 Food. Move to stage 1.

title: Grainery
blockc: Immediate: Spend 7 progress. Increase Food track. Complete mission path.

title: Food Source
blocka: Interrupt: +1 Food. Roll dice and add to pool.
